intro: Microlicia calycina, commonly known as the golden cup or yellow cup, is a flowering plant native to South America. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias. Microlicia calycina is often cultivated in gardens for its ornamental value and is also used in traditional medicine.
